Package com.csse3200.game.components.player.inventory

Class UsableItem

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.player.inventory.UsableItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collectible
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bandage, BearTrap, BigRedButton, MedKit, Reroll, RingFire, ShieldPotion, TargetDummy, TeleporterItem
public abstract class UsableItem extends Object implements Collectible
An item that can be used at the player's leisure.
